ARABIC: إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for his wife. We have decreed her to be one of those who stay behind.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Other than his wife who, it is decreed, will remain with those who will stay behind."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except his wife (about whom Allah says that) We have decreed that she shall be among those who stay behind."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except his wife who is doomed to be left behind."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Except his wife – we have decided that she is of those who will stay behind.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except for his wife, of whom We have decreed that she shall be of those who remain behind."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except his wife; We ordained that she shall surely be of those who remain behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: all together, excepting his wife -- we have decreed, she shall surely be of those that tarry.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Except his wife, of whom We had decreed that she should be of those who stay behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except his wife. We have decreed that she will be among those who remain behind [and will be lost].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But not his wife; we have decreed that she will be of those staying behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except his wife, [who], We have ordained, will indeed be among those who remain behind.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except his wife, who, We have ascertained, will be among those who will lag behind."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except his wife, of whom We have decreed that she shall be of those who remain behind (i.e. she will be destroyed)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but his wife. We decreed that she should be amongst those who remain behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Except for his wife.” We have determined that she will be of those who lag behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:60] except his wife — We have decreed that she indeed should be of those who will remain behind’, [of] those who will stay behind in the chastisement, because of her unbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Except his wife) his other wife, Wa'ilah the hypocrite, (of whom We had decreed that she should be of those who stay behind) and be destroyed.
